text: Again I looked up and saw a flying scroll.
And he said to me, &#34What do you see?&#34 I answered, &#34I see a flying scroll; its length is twenty cubits, and its width ten cubits.&#34

Then he said to me, &#34This is the curse that goes out over the face of the whole land; for everyone who steals shall be cut off according to the writing on one side, and everyone who swears falsely shall be cut off according to the writing on the other side.

I have sent it out, says the LORD of hosts, and it shall enter the house of the thief, and the house of anyone who swears falsely by my name; and it shall abide in that house and consume it, both timber and stones.&#34
Then the angel who talked with me came forward and said to me, &#34Look up and see what this is that is coming out.&#34
I said, &#34What is it?&#34 He said, &#34This is a basket coming out.&#34 And he said, &#34This is their iniquity in all the land.&#34
Then a leaden cover was lifted, and there was a woman sitting in the basket!
And he said, &#34This is Wickedness.&#34 So he thrust her back into the basket, and pressed the leaden weight down on its mouth.
Then I looked up and saw two women coming forward. The wind was in their wings; they had wings like the wings of a stork, and they lifted up the basket between earth and sky.
Then I said to the angel who talked with me, &#34Where are they taking the basket?&#34
He said to me, &#34To the land of Shinar, to build a house for it; and when this is prepared, they will set the basket down there on its base.&#34
